00181     public SequenceML(String catalogpropertyfile, Document submitted_dom, BioDOMWarningBox warningBox)
00182             throws BioDOMException {
00183         super(catalogpropertyfile);
00184         isNillable = true;
00185         if (warningBox != null) {
00186             this.setWarningBox(warningBox);
00187         }
00188         if (submitted_dom != null) {
00189             this.setDom(submitted_dom);
00190         } else {
00191             initDOM();
00192         }
00193     }

00233     /*
00234      * (non-Javadoc)
00235      * 
00236      * @see de.unibi.techfak.bibiserv.biodom.SequenceMLInterface#toFasta()
00237      */
00238     public String toFasta(final int wrapwidth) throws BioDOMException {
00239         // validate current SequenceML
00240         if (!validate()) {
00241             throw new BioDOMException("DOM validation failed");
00242         }
00243         StringBuffer fasta = new StringBuffer();
00244         char[] tmpfasta;
00245         // log.debug("trying to get all Elements 'sequence'");
00246         final NodeList sequences = dom.getDocumentElement().getElementsByTagNameNS(NAMESPACE,ELEM_SEQUENCE);
00247         for (int i = 0; i < sequences.getLength(); i++) {
00248             // log.debug("processing 'sequence' " + i);
00249             final Element sequence = (Element) sequences.item(i);
00250             // log.debug("trying to get attribute 'seqID' from 'sequence'");
00251             // every sequence must have an ID
00252             fasta = fasta.append(">" + sequence.getAttributeNS(null,ATT_SEQID).replaceAll(" ", ""));
00253             // add description if defined
00254             if (sequence.getElementsByTagNameNS(NAMESPACE,ELEM_DESCRIPTION).getLength() > 0) {
00255                 // log.debug("trying to get first child Element 'description'");
00256                 final String description = getTextContent(sequence.getElementsByTagNameNS(NAMESPACE,ELEM_DESCRIPTION).item(0));
00257                 if (description != null) {
00258                     fasta = fasta.append(" " + description);
00259                 }
00260             }
00261             fasta = fasta.append(System.getProperty("line.separator"));
00262             if (sequence.getElementsByTagNameNS(NAMESPACE,ELEM_NUCLEICACIDSEQUENCE).getLength() > 0) {
00263                 tmpfasta = (getTextContent(sequence.getElementsByTagNameNS(NAMESPACE,ELEM_NUCLEICACIDSEQUENCE).item(0)))
00264                         .toCharArray();
00265             } else if (sequence.getElementsByTagNameNS(NAMESPACE,ELEM_AMINOACIDSEQUENCE).getLength() > 0) {
00266                 tmpfasta = (getTextContent(sequence.getElementsByTagNameNS(NAMESPACE,ELEM_AMINOACIDSEQUENCE).item(0)))
00267                         .toCharArray();
00268             } else {
00269                 tmpfasta = (getTextContent(sequence.getElementsByTagNameNS(NAMESPACE,ELEM_FREESEQUENCE).item(0))).toCharArray();
00270             }
00271 
00272             /* TODO: Add a more efficient method for line-wrapping the sequences (than char-by-char)!! */
00273              //define line length
00274             if (wrapwidth == -1) {
00275                 fasta.append(tmpfasta);
00276             } else if (wrapwidth > 0) {
00277             
00278                 for (int cp = 0; cp < tmpfasta.length; cp++) {
00279                     // append next character
00280                     fasta.append(tmpfasta[cp]);
00281                     // if we've appended the linebreaking number of characters,
00282                     // append a newline...
00283                     if (((cp + 1) % wrapwidth) == 0) {
00284                         fasta = fasta.append(System.getProperty("line.separator"));
00285                     }
00286                 }
00287             } else {
00288                 throw new BioDOMException("SequenceML.toFasta(int wrapwidth) : wrapwidth must be -1 or > 0");
00289             }
00290 
00291             if (i != sequences.getLength() - 1) {// a new seq will be
00292                 // appended
00293                 fasta = fasta.append(System.getProperty("line.separator"));
00294             }
00295         }
00296         // SH: add a newline after all sequences have been written
00297         fasta = fasta.append(System.getProperty("line.separator"));
00298         return (fasta.toString());
00299     }

00339      * (non-Javadoc)

00348     /*
00349      * (non-Javadoc)
00350      * 
00351      * @see de.unibi.techfak.bibiserv.biodom.SequenceMLInterface#appendFasta(java.io.Reader,
00352      *      int)
00353      */
00354     public void appendFasta(final Reader fasta, final int seqType) throws BioDOMException, IOException {
00355         // read from Fasta Reader to StringBuffer ...
00356         final LineNumberReader br = new LineNumberReader(fasta);
00357 
00358         String id = null;
00359         String description = null;
00360         StringBuffer sequenceBuffer = new StringBuffer();
00361         String s;
00362 
00363         while ((s = br.readLine()) != null) {
00364             if (s.equals("")) {
00365                 // skip empty line! exception otherwise!
00366                 log.warning("Empty line detected. Skipping empty line!");
00367                 warningBox.appendWarning(this, "Empty line detected. Skipping empty line!");
00368             } else {
00369                 if (s.charAt(0) != '>') { // if line does NOT start with ">"
00370                                             // assuming it's contains sequence
00371                                             // information
00372                     if (id != null) {
00373                         sequenceBuffer = sequenceBuffer.append(s);
00374                     } else {
00375                         throw new BioDOMException("line " + br.getLineNumber() + ": No id before sequence starts!");
00376                     }
00377                 } else { // line start with ">" or it is the last line
00378                     // if any id exists, we've parsed an sequence before and can
00379                     // add it to current dom
00380                     if (id != null) {
00381                         appendSequence(id, description, sequenceBuffer.toString(), seqType);
00382                         sequenceBuffer = new StringBuffer();
00383                     }
00384                     // removing leading whitespaces and get id and description
00385                     final String[] idDesc = s.substring(1).trim().split(" ", 2);
00386                     // get id
00387                     if (idDesc.length > 0) {
00388                         id = idDesc[0];
00389                         if (!unique(id)) {
00390                             id = id + "_" + generateId();
00391                             warningBox.appendWarning(this, "line " + br.getLineNumber()
00392                                     + ": Sequence has a non unique ID! Creating a unique ID!\n");
00393                         }
00394                     } else {
00395                         id = generateId();
00396                         warningBox.appendWarning(this, "line " + br.getLineNumber()
00397                                 + ": Sequence has no ID! Creating a unique ID!\n");
00398                     }
00399                     // get description if given
00400                     if (idDesc.length > 1) {
00401                         description = idDesc[1];
00402                     } else {
00403                         description = null;
00404                     }
00405                 }
00406             }
00407         }
00408         // if sequenceBuffer ist empty, we have an empty sequence and therefore
00409         // throw an exception...
00410         if (sequenceBuffer.length() == 0)
00411             throw new BioDOMException("Sequence contains no sequence information (empty sequence)!");
00412         // ...otherwise, the last sequence contains sequence information, so we
00413         // add the last sequence
00414         appendSequence(id, description, sequenceBuffer.toString(), seqType);
00415         //close Reader
00416         br.close();
00417     }

00439     /*
00440      * (non-Javadoc)
00441      * 
00442      * @see de.unibi.techfak.bibiserv.biodom.SequenceMLInterface#appendSequence(java.lang.String,
00443      *      java.lang.String, java.lang.String, int)
00444      */
00445     public void appendSequence(final String id, final String description, final String sequence, final int seqType)
00446             throws BioDOMException {
00447         // prepare patterns for parsing input
00448         final Pattern nucleoacidaPattern = Pattern.compile("^[" + NUCLEICACID_CHARS + "]+$");
00449         final Pattern aminoacidPattern = Pattern.compile("^[" + AMINOACID_CHARS + "]+$");
00450         // get root element
00451         final Element sequences = dom.getDocumentElement();
00452         // create a new Sequence element
00453         final Element eSequence = dom.createElementNS(NAMESPACE, ELEM_SEQUENCE);
00454         sequences.appendChild(eSequence);
00455         // / ... and add id element to dom and ...
00456         eSequence.setAttributeNS(null, ATT_SEQID, id);
00457         // add id to internal id list to determine uniques of id's
00458         idlist.add(id);
00459         // add description if set
00460         if (description != null) {
00461             final Element eDescription = dom.createElementNS(NAMESPACE, ELEM_DESCRIPTION);
00462             eSequence.appendChild(eDescription);
00463             eDescription.appendChild(dom.createTextNode(description));
00464         }
00465         // add content
00466         if (seqType == AMINOACID) {
00467             final Element eSeq = dom.createElementNS(NAMESPACE, ELEM_AMINOACIDSEQUENCE);
00468             eSequence.appendChild(eSeq);
00469             if (!aminoacidPattern.matcher(sequence).matches()) {
00470                 throw new BioDOMException("unallowed char (allowed: " + AMINOACID_CHARS + ") in aminoaacid-sequence "
00471                         + sequence);
00472             }
00473             eSeq.appendChild(dom.createTextNode(sequence));
00474         } else if (seqType == NUCLEICACID) {
00475             final Element eSeq = dom.createElementNS(NAMESPACE, ELEM_NUCLEICACIDSEQUENCE);
00476             eSequence.appendChild(eSeq);
00477             if (!nucleoacidaPattern.matcher(sequence).matches()) {
00478                 throw new BioDOMException("unallowed char (allowed: " + NUCLEICACID_CHARS
00479                         + ") in nucleicacid-sequence " + sequence);
00480             }
00481             eSeq.appendChild(dom.createTextNode(sequence));
00482         } else if (seqType == UNKNOWNSEQUENCE) {
00483             if (!aminoacidPattern.matcher(sequence).matches()) { // unallowed
00484                                                                     // char ->
00485                                                                     // free
00486                                                                     // sequence
00487                 final Element eSeq = dom.createElementNS(NAMESPACE, ELEM_FREESEQUENCE);
00488                 eSequence.appendChild(eSeq);
00489                 eSeq.appendChild(dom.createTextNode(sequence));
00490             } else if (!nucleoacidaPattern.matcher(sequence).matches()) { // aminoacid
00491                                                                             // (contains
00492                                                                             // chars
00493                                                                             // that
00494                                                                             // are
00495                                                                             // only
00496                                                                             // allowed
00497                                                                             // in
00498                                                                             // aminoacid
00499                 final Element eSeq = dom.createElementNS(NAMESPACE, ELEM_AMINOACIDSEQUENCE);
00500                 eSequence.appendChild(eSeq);
00501                 eSeq.appendChild(dom.createTextNode(sequence));
00502             } else { // aminoacid or nucleicacid? -> depends on percentage of
00503                         // ACGTU (current >= 90%)
00504                 final String uSeq = sequence.toUpperCase();
00505                 int cnt = 0, length = uSeq.length();
00506                 for (int i = 0; i < uSeq.length(); i++) {
00507                     final char c = uSeq.charAt(i);
00508                     if (c == 'A' || c == 'C' || c == 'G' || c == 'T' || c == 'U')
00509                         cnt++;
00510                 }
00511                 if ((double) cnt / (double) length >= 0.9) { // over 90% of
00512                                                                 // sequence are
00513                                                                 // ACGTU ->
00514                                                                 // probably
00515                                                                 // nucleicacid
00516                     final Element eSeq = dom.createElementNS(NAMESPACE, ELEM_NUCLEICACIDSEQUENCE);
00517                     eSequence.appendChild(eSeq);
00518                     eSeq.appendChild(dom.createTextNode(sequence));
00519                     warningBox.appendWarning(this, "No sequence type defined. Determined sequence as Nucleicacid");
00520                 } else { // over 10% of sequence are not ACGTU -> probably
00521                             // aminoacid
00522                     final Element eSeq = dom.createElementNS(NAMESPACE, ELEM_AMINOACIDSEQUENCE);
00523                     eSequence.appendChild(eSeq);
00524                     eSeq.appendChild(dom.createTextNode(sequence));
00525                     warningBox.appendWarning(this, "No sequence type defined. Determined sequence as Aminoacid");
00526                 }
00527             }
00528         } else {
00529             final Element eSeq = dom.createElementNS(NAMESPACE, ELEM_FREESEQUENCE);
00530             eSequence.appendChild(eSeq);
00531             eSeq.appendChild(dom.createTextNode(sequence));
00532         }
00533     }
00534 
00535     /*
00536      * (non-Javadoc)
00537      * 
00538      * @see de.unibi.techfak.bibiserv.biodom.SequenceMLInterface#getSequence(java.lang.String)
00539      */
00540     public Map getSequence(final String id) throws BioDOMException {
00541         if (unique(id)) {
00542             throw new BioDOMException("The given sequence ID (" + id + ")is not in current sequenceML object");
00543         }
00544         final Map<String, Object> hm = new Hashtable<String, Object>();
00545         hm.put("id", id);
00546         final NodeList nl = dom.getElementsByTagNameNS(NAMESPACE,ELEM_SEQUENCE);
00547         for (int counter = 0; counter < nl.getLength(); ++counter) {
00548             final Element seq = (Element) nl.item(counter);
00549             if (seq.getAttributeNS(null,ATT_SEQID).equals(id)) {
00550                 // check for name and add it
00551                 if (seq.getElementsByTagNameNS(NAMESPACE,ELEM_NAME).getLength() > 0) {
00552                     hm.put("name", seq.getElementsByTagNameNS(NAMESPACE,ELEM_NAME).item(0).getTextContent());
00553                 }
00554 
00555                 // check for synonyms
00556                 if (seq.getElementsByTagNameNS(NAMESPACE,ELEM_SYNONYMS).getLength() > 0) {
00557                     final NodeList synonymNodes = seq.getElementsByTagNameNS(NAMESPACE,ELEM_SYNONYMS);
00558                     final List<String> synonyms = new ArrayList<String>();
00559                     for (int i = 0; i < synonymNodes.getLength(); i++) {
00560                         synonyms.add(((Element) synonymNodes.item(i)).getTextContent());
00561                     }
00562                     hm.put("synonyms", synonyms);
00563                 }
00564 
00565                 // check for description and add it
00566                 if (seq.getElementsByTagNameNS(NAMESPACE,ELEM_DESCRIPTION).getLength() > 0) {
00567                     hm.put("description", seq.getElementsByTagNameNS(NAMESPACE,ELEM_DESCRIPTION).item(0).getTextContent());
00568                 }
00569                 // check for nucleicacid, aminoacod or freesequence or empty!
00570                 if (seq.getElementsByTagNameNS(NAMESPACE,ELEM_NUCLEICACIDSEQUENCE).getLength() > 0) {
00571                     hm.put("sequence", seq.getElementsByTagNameNS(NAMESPACE,ELEM_NUCLEICACIDSEQUENCE).item(0).getTextContent());
00572                     hm.put("sequenceType_name", NUCLEICACID_NAME);
00573                     hm.put("sequenceType", NUCLEICACID);
00574                 } else if (seq.getElementsByTagNameNS(NAMESPACE,ELEM_AMINOACIDSEQUENCE).getLength() > 0) {
00575                     hm.put("sequence", seq.getElementsByTagNameNS(NAMESPACE,ELEM_AMINOACIDSEQUENCE).item(0).getTextContent());
00576                     hm.put("sequenceType_name", AMINOACID_NAME);
00577                     hm.put("sequenceType", AMINOACID);
00578                 } else if (seq.getElementsByTagNameNS(NAMESPACE,ELEM_FREESEQUENCE).getLength() > 0) {
00579                     hm.put("sequence", seq.getElementsByTagNameNS(NAMESPACE,ELEM_FREESEQUENCE).item(0).getTextContent());
00580                     hm.put("sequenceType_name", FREESEQUENCE_NAME);
00581                     hm.put("sequenceType", FREE);
00582                 } else {
00583                     hm.put("sequenceType_name", EMPTYSEQUENCE_NAME);
00584                     hm.put("sequenceType", EMPTYSEQUENCE);
00585                 }
00586             }
00587         }
00588         return hm;
00589     }

00594      * @see de.unibi.techfak.bibiserv.biodom.SequenceMLInterface#getIDlist()

00596     public List<String> getIDlist() {
00597         return idlist;

00600     // ////////////////////////////////
00601     // //// Private Methods
00602     // ////////////////////////////////
00606     private void initDOM() {
00607         dom = DB.newDocument();
00608         final Element root = dom.createElementNS(NAMESPACE, ELEM_SEQUENCEML);
00609         root.setAttributeNS(XMLConstants.W3C_XML_SCHEMA_INSTANCE_NS_URI,"schemaLocation", NAMESPACE+" "+NSLOCATION);
00610         dom.appendChild(root);
00611         dom.normalizeDocument();
00612         log.config("DOM ready...");
00613     }
00614 
00615     
00620     private void initIDLIST(){
00621         //      clear idlist
00622         idlist.clear();
00623         
00624         // get id from dom
00625         NodeList sequences = dom.getElementsByTagNameNS(NAMESPACE,ELEM_SEQUENCE);
00626         for (int i = 0; i < sequences.getLength(); ++i){
00627             Element sequence = (Element)sequences.item(i);
00628             //append id's to idlist
00629             idlist.add(sequence.getAttributeNS(null,ATT_SEQID));
00630         }
00631     }
00632     
00639     private boolean unique(final String id) {
00640         for (String i : idlist) {
00641             if (i.equals(id)) {
00642                 return false;
00643             }
00644         }
00645         return true;
00646     }
